Name: Argo Payload
Ability 1: Place 3 Opening tokens in the Kratos Pool. Note: Primes on a 5+
Ability 2: Place 2 Break tokens in the Kratos Pool. Note: Primes on a 5+

Name: Labyrinthian Payload
Ability 1 Cost: 1 Infused Mechanism or Fleshy Mantle resource
Ability 1: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative Precision token
Ability 2 Cost: 1 Fear Essence or Maze Fragment resource
Ability 2: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative To Hit token
Ability 3 Cost: 1 Muscle Cluster or Calcified Knuckle Bone resource
Ability 3: Fire when you attack to gain Pushback 4 and ignore the Lumbering Trait

Name: Adversary Payload
Ability 1 Cost: 1 Retractable Mechanism or Reliefshell Fragment resource
Ability 1: Fire to give the Primrdoail 1 negative AT token until the end of the Round. Note; Primes on a 7+
Ability 2 Cost: 1 Grotesque Beak or Powdered Matter resource
Ability 2: Fire to give the Primordial 1 negative Precision token
Ability 3 Cost: 1 Living Abyss or Skin of Malice resource
Ability 3: Fire to palce 5 Fire tokens in the Kratos Pool
